message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but $9000 is a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

I understand that $9000 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer you the product for $8200. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $8200 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $8100. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm getting close to your price, Bob! I can offer you the product for $8150. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product. What do you think?
I'm getting close to your price, but I'm still a bit short. I'm willing to meet you at $8000. Can you meet me at this price?
